# Undead Blood (Su)
## Overview
*Undead Blood (Su)*: While raging, all of the barbarianâ€™s melee attacks are treated as if they were made with a weapon with the *[[Ghost Touch (Arm_ShldSpcAb)|ghost touch]]* weapon special ability.

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 80
